title: Common definitions
description: Common definitions that are referenced in the API and Bridging wire protocol schemas

RequestUuid.title: Request UUID
RequestUuid.description: Unique identifier for a request or event message. Required in all message types

ResponseUuid.title: Response UUID
ResponseUuid.description: Unique identifier for a response to a specific message and must always be accompanied by a RequestUuid.

EventUuid.title: Event UUID
EventUuid.description: Unique identifier for an event message sent from a Desktop Agent to an app.

ListenerUuid.title: Listener UUID
ListenerUuid.description: Unique identifier for a `listener` object returned by a Desktop Agent to an app in response to addContextListener, addIntentListener or one of the PrivateChannel event listeners and used to identify it in messages (e.g. when unsubscribing).

Timestamp.title: Timestamp
Timestamp.description: Timestamp at which the message was generated

PrivateChannelEventListenerTypes.title: Private Channel Event Listener Types
PrivateChannelEventListenerTypes.description: Event listener type names for Private Channel events
